content:
Besaniyaa nagare moraan
Chennu virunnaaghoshatthil
Maranatthil ninnezhunnetta
Lovaasaar sahithamirunnu.

Aadaamvamshe-naathhan cheythoraashcharyam-paaram shreshdham
Priya laasarine-prathi naathhan
Shishyaanvithanaay-kabaril poyi
/tkezhunnavare-kandanveshichaan
/tsamskaaram che-ythevidavane ningall
Kabaril vachi-ttayyayyo naall naalaayi
Kartthaavangathyuchatthil -kalpichezhunnelpichavane
Aashcharyatthaa-laallkkoottam jeevapradane
Haaleluyyaa-sthothram cheythu.
